alert.note: Alert for Custer (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 5:55PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Custer County through 630 PM MDT... At 554 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles northeast of Volborg, or 26 miles southeast of Miles City, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Custer County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
